Trader Garette: Hey, young fellow, you look great! Are you back from a grand adventure or are you looking for one? Let's toast to your fortune! If you want some good stuff you have come to the right place! Everything is on sale! This would be a good time to stock up on everything you need... A full pack is lucky! No treasure for stingy adventurers...
